name: Power to Play: The Game
storyline: Play as one of the members of McFly as they overcome obstacles and achieve the power to play.
summary:
Collect lightning bolts, fight enemies along the way, and the album art to power up. Defeat the final boss. Do you have the power to play?

A browser game promoting British pop punk band "McFly". An homage to the original Super Mario Bros. and other retro titles.
